did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Catalogues, a prospectus, a yearbook, and pictures.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Catalogues (1887, 1893-1894, 1896-1897, 1923-1924, 1924-1925, 1931-1932), prospectus and yearbook (ca. 1900), and pictures of the school (ca. 1900).

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Cascadilla School was a boarding school for boys in Ithaca, New York.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Catalogues (1887, 1893-1894, 1896-1897, 1923-1924, 1924-1925, 1931-1932), prospectus and yearbook (ca. 1900), and pictures of the school (ca. 1900).
Accession folder contains a "Catalogue of Students of the Cascadilla School, 1876-94."

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cascadilla School publications, #1152. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Prospectus and viewbook, containing endorsements of Jacob Gould Schurman, Charles Kendall Adams, R.H. Thurston, E.A. Fuertes and photographs and descriptions of the school and its facilities
Special announcement concerning innovations: a separate home for younger boys and a recreation building
Leaflet of department of physical culture

scopecontent.p: Prospectus and viewbook, containing endorsements by Jacob Gould Schurman and Charles Kendall Adams, pictures of student rooms, buildings, etc.

did.unittitle: Pictures of Cascadilla School buildings and activities, apparently removed from a catalogue printed in the late '90s (10 pcs.)

scopecontent.p: Wait Hall, West Front; main dining room; boys' room and principal's office; residence and Wait Hall, west front; the residence, East Front; new boat house; Wait Hall vestibule and '96 crew practicing on new rowing machines; '94 crew and C.U. from the Cascadilla School residence; new boat house (from Fall Creek) and the 1895 crew; east veranda of residence
